AddContainerCluster.title: AddContainerCluster
AddContainerCluster.summary: Registers a Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) cluster.

ChangeResourceGroup.title: ChangeResourceGroup
ChangeResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which an instance belongs.

CheckRole.title: CheckRole
CheckRole.summary: Checks whether the user has permissions to access the current resource or page.

CreateClients.title: CreateClients
CreateClients.summary: Installs one or more Cloud Backup clients on specified instances.

CreateHanaBackupPlan.title: CreateHanaBackupPlan
CreateHanaBackupPlan.summary: Creates a backup plan for an SAP HANA instance.

CreateHanaRestore.title: CreateHanaRestore
CreateHanaRestore.summary: Creates a restore job for an SAP HANA database.

CreatePolicyBindings.title: CreatePolicyBindings
CreatePolicyBindings.summary: Binds one or more data sources to a backup policy.

CreateTempFileUploadUrl.title: CreateTempFileUploadUrl
CreateTempFileUploadUrl.summary: Generates the parameters and signature required for a file upload URL.

DeleteAirEcsInstance.title: DeleteAirEcsInstance
DeleteAirEcsInstance.summary: Removes the Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance that is used for restoration only in ECS Backup Essential Edition.

DeleteBackupClientResource.title: DeleteBackupClientResource
DeleteBackupClientResource.summary: Deletes the resources that are related to one or more HBR clients.

DeleteHanaBackupPlan.title: DeleteHanaBackupPlan
DeleteHanaBackupPlan.summary: Deletes an SAP HANA backup plan.

DeletePolicyBinding.title: DeletePolicyBinding
DeletePolicyBinding.summary: Disassociates one or more data sources from a backup policy. After you disassociate the data sources from the backup policy, the backup policy no longer protects the data sources. Proceed with caution.

DeleteUdmEcsInstance.title: DeleteUdmEcsInstance
DeleteUdmEcsInstance.summary: Stops protection for Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance backup.

DescribeBackupClients.title: DescribeBackupClients
DescribeBackupClients.summary: Queries the information about one or more HBR clients that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeBackupJobs2.title: DescribeBackupJobs2
DescribeBackupJobs2.summary: Queries the information about one or more backup jobs that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeBackupPlans.title: DescribeBackupPlans
DescribeBackupPlans.summary: Queries the information about one or more backup plans that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeClients.title: DescribeClients
DescribeClients.summary: Queries one or more Cloud Backup clients that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeContainerCluster.title: DescribeContainerCluster
DescribeContainerCluster.summary: Queries one or more container clusters that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeHanaBackupPlans.title: DescribeHanaBackupPlans
DescribeHanaBackupPlans.summary: Queries one or more SAP HANA backup plans that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeHanaBackupSetting.title: DescribeHanaBackupSetting
DescribeHanaBackupSetting.summary: Queries the backup parameters of an SAP HANA database.

DescribeHanaBackupsAsync.title: DescribeHanaBackupsAsync
DescribeHanaBackupsAsync.summary: Queries one or more SAP HANA backups that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeHanaDatabases.title: DescribeHanaDatabases
DescribeHanaDatabases.summary: Queries the information about SAP HANA databases.

DescribeHanaInstances.title: DescribeHanaInstances
DescribeHanaInstances.summary: Queries one or more SAP HANA instances that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeHanaRestores.title: DescribeHanaRestores
DescribeHanaRestores.summary: Queries one or more SAP HANA restore jobs that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeHanaRetentionSetting.title: DescribeHanaRetentionSetting
DescribeHanaRetentionSetting.summary: Queries the backup retention period of an SAP HANA database.

DescribeOtsTableSnapshots.title: DescribeOtsTableSnapshots
DescribeOtsTableSnapshots.summary: Queries the details about Tablestore instances that are backed up.

DescribePoliciesV2.title: DescribePoliciesV2
DescribePoliciesV2.summary: Queries one or more backup policies.

DescribePolicyBindings.title: DescribePolicyBindings
DescribePolicyBindings.summary: Query one or more data sources bound to a policy, or query one or more policies bound to a data source.

DescribeRecoverableOtsInstances.title: DescribeRecoverableOtsInstances
DescribeRecoverableOtsInstances.summary: Queries the tables of a restorable Tablestore instance.

DescribeRestoreJobs2.title: DescribeRestoreJobs2
DescribeRestoreJobs2.summary: Queries one or more restore jobs that meet the specified conditions.

DescribeUdmSnapshots.title: DescribeUdmSnapshots
DescribeUdmSnapshots.summary: Queries the backup snapshots of an Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

DescribeVaultReplicationRegions.title: DescribeVaultReplicationRegions
DescribeVaultReplicationRegions.summary: Queries the regions that support cross-region replication.

DescribeVaults.title: DescribeVaults
DescribeVaults.summary: Queries the information about one or more backup vaults that meet the specified conditions.

DetachNasFileSystem.title: DetachNasFileSystem
DetachNasFileSystem.summary: Deletes an internal mount target created by Cloud Backup.

DisableHanaBackupPlan.title: DisableHanaBackupPlan
DisableHanaBackupPlan.summary: Disables an SAP HANA backup plan.

EnableHanaBackupPlan.title: EnableHanaBackupPlan
EnableHanaBackupPlan.summary: Enables an SAP HANA backup plan.

ExecutePolicyV2.title: Execute Policy
ExecutePolicyV2.summary: Execute a policy for one or all bound data sources.

GenerateRamPolicy.title: GenerateRamPolicy
GenerateRamPolicy.summary: Generates a Resource Access Management (RAM) policy.

GetTempFileDownloadLink.title: GetTempFileDownloadLink
GetTempFileDownloadLink.summary: Obtains download links of files such as job reports.

InstallBackupClients.title: InstallBackupClients
InstallBackupClients.summary: Installs an HBR client on one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.

SearchHistoricalSnapshots.title: SearchHistoricalSnapshots
SearchHistoricalSnapshots.summary: Queries the information about one or more backup snapshots that meet the specified conditions.

UninstallBackupClients.title: UninstallBackupClients
UninstallBackupClients.summary: Uninstalls a Cloud Backup client from one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instance.

UpdateClientSettings.title: UpdateClientSettings
UpdateClientSettings.summary: Updates the configurations of an HBR client.

UpdateContainerCluster.title: Update Container Cluster Information
UpdateContainerCluster.summary: Update container cluster information, including the container cluster name, network type, etc.

UpdateHanaBackupPlan.title: UpdateHanaBackupPlan
UpdateHanaBackupPlan.summary: Updates an SAP HANA backup plan.

UpdateHanaBackupSetting.title: UpdateHanaBackupSetting
UpdateHanaBackupSetting.summary: Updates the backup parameters of an SAP HANA database.

UpdateHanaRetentionSetting.title: UpdateHanaRetentionSetting
UpdateHanaRetentionSetting.summary: Updates the backup retention period of an SAP HANA database.

UpdatePolicyBinding.title: UpdatePolicyBinding
UpdatePolicyBinding.summary: Modifies the association between a backup policy and a data source.

UpdateVault.title: UpdateVault
UpdateVault.summary: Updates the configuration information about the backup vault.

UpgradeBackupClients.title: UpgradeBackupClients
UpgradeBackupClients.summary: Upgrades an HBR client on one or more Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances.
